<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>

  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>NCTE_Scoilnet</catalog>
            <entry>6145</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">The Giggler Treatment by Roddy Doyle Quiz 1</string>
            <string language="es">The Giggler Treatment por Roddy Doyle – Cuestionario 1</string>
            <string language="ga">The Giggler Treatment le Roddy Doyle – Tráth na gCeist 1</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Die Giggler Behandlung durch Roddy Doyle Quiz 1</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Le traitement de Giggler par le jeu 1 de Roddy 
Doyle</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">O tratamento de Giggler pelo quiz 1 de Roddy 
Doyle</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Il trattamento di Giggler dal quiz 1 del Roddy 
Doyle</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Η επεξεργασία Giggler από Roddy Doyle το 
διαγωνισμό γνώσεων 1</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">The pupils will reflect on the content of chapters 1 and 2. They will deepen their understanding of the content.</string>
            <string language="es">Los alumnos reflexionarán sobre el contenido de los capítulos 1 y 2. Profundizarán su conocimiento del contenido.</string>
            <string language="ga">Smaoineoidh na daltaí ar ábhar chaibidlí 1 agus 2.  Beidh tuiscint níos fearr acu ar an ábhar.</string>
          </description>
          <language>en</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">English</string>
            <string language="es">Inglés</string>
            <string language="ga">Béarla</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Die Pupillen reflektieren sich auf dem Inhalt von 
Kapiteln 1 und 2. Sie vertiefen ihr Verständnis des Inhalts.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Les pupilles réfléchiront sur le contenu des 
chapitres 1 et 2. Elles approfondiront leur arrangement du 
contenu.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">As pupilas refletirão no índice dos capítulos 1
e 2. Aprofundarão sua compreensão do índice.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Le pupille rifletteranno sul contenuto dei 
capitoli 1 e 2. Approfondiranno la loro comprensione del 
soddisfare.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Οι μαθητές θα εξετάσουν το περιεχόμενο των κεφαλαίων 1
και 2. Θα εμβαθύνουν την κατανόησή τους του περιεχομένου.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Englisch</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Anglais</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Inglês</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Inglese</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αγγλικά</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>

All materials may be downloaded and copied for non-commercial purposes only, provided that the source is acknowledged. The reproduction of material for commercial purposes is strictly prohibited.

Material within the linked sites outside of Scoilnet may also have copyright restrictions and this should be checked on these websites should you plan to use their content in any way.</string>
